title: Manage Property Tour for an Investor
description: An out-of-state investor is flying in to tour a portfolio of three potential investment properties.

tasks.description: Create a detailed tour schedule, including travel time between properties.
tasks.expected_outcome: An efficient tour itinerary is created.

tasks.description: Coordinate with the listing agents or property managers of all three properties to ensure access.
tasks.expected_outcome: Access is confirmed for all properties on the tour.

tasks.description: Prepare a tour book with the Offering Memorandum for each property.
tasks.expected_outcome: A professional package of materials is prepared for the investor.
